<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oil of Unlife](/Equipment.aspx?ID=718)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 258 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All character have access to all levels of the oil of unlife_

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This thin, black liquid imparts a bone-deep chill while rapidly repairing an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature's physical or spiritual form. When you dash _oil of unlife_ onto an undead creature, or a living creature with [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), the oil absorbs quickly into its body, and the creature regains the listed number of Hit Points. You can pour _oil of unlife_ on an [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) undead; in this case, the creature absorbs the oil into itself.
